desc: We take great pride in representing a large range of high quality artworks by highly talented indigenous artists from affordable to highly collectable investment paintings. All our paintings come with Certificate of Authenticity detailing the artists Biography and photographs of the Artist holding your painting.

layout.text: Jila Arts is an art gallery and art studio in Alice Springs, Northern Territory. Jila Arts have a focus on Contemporary Art from the Central and Western desert regions around Alice Springs.
